strings.BARREL1_DESCRIPTION: Gives survivors a splash of gold. It contains 8 gold and 4 XP that can be retrieved by opening it. Scales with difficulty. Since money-costing interactables scale exponentially with the difficulty coefficient, the relative reward of a barrel compared to the cost of a chest falls off quickly with time. For example, against a small chest, at the beginning of the game on Easy Difficulty the ratio is roughly equal to 1/3 and then drops off to approximately 1/4 and 1/5 for the Hard and Impossible difficulties respectively.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_ANCIENTLOFT: You dream of clarity.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_BLACKBEACH: You dream of waves, crashing on cliffsides.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_DAMPCAVESIMPLE: You dream of fire.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_FOGGYSWAMP: You dream of twisting roots.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_FROZENWALL: You dream of quiet snowfall.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_GOLDSHORES: You dream of wealth.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_GOLEMPLAINS: You dream of rolling hills.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_GOOLAKE: You dream of sand beneath your feet.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_HABITAT: You dream of vines, cutting through the sky.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_HABITATFALL: You dream of golden leaves.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_HELMINTH: You dream of worms.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_LAKESNIGHT: You dream of falls, erupting from the flora.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_LEMURIANTEMPLE: You dream of refuge.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_MERIDIAN: You dream of rebirth.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_MOON: You dream of glass and dirt.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_ROOTJUNGLE: You dream of violent growth.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_SHIPGRAVEYARD: You dream of wind.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_SKYMEADOW: You dream of serenity.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_SNOWYFOREST: You dream of fire and ice.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_SULFURPOOLS: You dream of brimstone.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_VILLAGE: You dream of lost poetry.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_VILLAGENIGHT: You dream of stabbing shards.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_VOIDSTAGE: You dream of potential.
strings.BAZAAR_SEER_WISPGRAVEYARD: You dream of wind, blowing through trees.
strings.BROTHERHURT_DEATH_1:
NO... NOT NOW...
<style=cDeath><size=100%><sprite name="Skull" tint=1> Mithrix has lost his kingdom. <sprite name="Skull" tint=1></size></style>
strings.BROTHERHURT_DEATH_2:
WHY... WHY NOW...?
<style=cDeath><size=100%><sprite name="Skull" tint=1> The war finally ends. <sprite name="Skull" tint=1></size></style>
strings.BROTHERHURT_DEATH_3:
NO... NO...!
<style=cDeath><size=100%><sprite name="Skull" tint=1> 『DESTRUCTION. SECURE. VALUABLE DATA. SAVE.】 <sprite name="Skull" tint=1></size></style>
strings.BROTHERHURT_DEATH_4:
BROTHER... HELP ME...!
<style=cDeath><size=100%><sprite name="Skull" tint=1> Mithrix' cries reach out, nobody there to respond. <sprite name="Skull" tint=1></size></style>
strings.BROTHERHURT_DEATH_5:
THIS PLANE GROWS DARK... BROTHER... I CANNOT SEE YOU... WHERE ARE YOU...?
<style=cDeath><size=100%><sprite name="Skull" tint=1> Mithrix searches for his family, to no avail. <sprite name="Skull" tint=1></size></style>
strings.BROTHERHURT_DEATH_6:
BROTHER... PERHAPS... WE WILL GET IT RIGHT... NEXT TIME...
<style=cDeath><size=100%><sprite name="Skull" tint=1> Mithrix stares into the well, dreaming of worms. <sprite name="Skull" tint=1></size></style>
strings.CASINOCHEST_DESCRIPTION: Costs gold to activate and will cycle through many items quickly. Interacting with the Adaptive Chest will drop the item currently displayed in the cycle. (63.06%/<style=cIsHealing>27.03%</style>/<style=cIsHealth>0.9%</style>/<color=#FF6633>9.01%</color>)
strings.CHEST1_DESCRIPTION: Costs gold to open and has a chance to contain either a common, uncommon, or legendary item. (79.2%/<style=cIsHealing>19.8%</style>/<style=cIsHealth>0.99%</style>)
strings.CHEST2_DESCRIPTION: Pricier Chest than the Small Chest that contains an item of at least uncommon rarity and has a higher chance to hold a legendary item. (<style=cIsHealing>80%</style>/<style=cIsHealth>20%</style>)

<mspace=0.5em>(2)</mspace> Teleporter <sprite name="TP" tint=1> Radius: <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style></style>
strings.ECLIPSE_3_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cSub><mspace=0.5em>(1)</mspace> Monsoon + Allies start every stage at <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style> health
<mspace=0.5em>(2)</mspace> Teleporter <sprite name="TP" tint=1> Radius: <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(3)</mspace> Ally Fall Damage: <style=cIsHealth>+100% and lethal</style></style>
strings.ECLIPSE_4_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cSub><mspace=0.5em>(1)</mspace> Monsoon + Allies start every stage at <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style> health
<mspace=0.5em>(2)</mspace> Teleporter <sprite name="TP" tint=1> Radius: <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(3)</mspace> Ally Fall Damage: <style=cIsHealth>+100% and lethal</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(4)</mspace> Enemy Movement Speed: <style=cIsHealth>+40%</style></style>
strings.ECLIPSE_5_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cSub><mspace=0.5em>(1)</mspace> Monsoon + Allies start every stage at <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style> health
<mspace=0.5em>(2)</mspace> Teleporter <sprite name="TP" tint=1> Radius: <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(3)</mspace> Ally Fall Damage: <style=cIsHealth>+100% and lethal</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(4)</mspace> Enemy Movement Speed: <style=cIsHealth>+40%</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(5)</mspace> Ally Healing & Regeneration: <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style></style>
strings.ECLIPSE_6_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cSub><mspace=0.5em>(1)</mspace> Monsoon + Allies start every stage at <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style> health
<mspace=0.5em>(2)</mspace> Teleporter <sprite name="TP" tint=1> Radius: <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(3)</mspace> Ally Fall Damage: <style=cIsHealth>+100% and lethal</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(4)</mspace> Enemy Movement Speed: <style=cIsHealth>+40%</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(5)</mspace> Ally Healing & Regeneration: <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(6)</mspace> Enemy Gold Drops: <style=cIsHealth>-20%</style></style>
strings.ECLIPSE_7_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cSub><mspace=0.5em>(1)</mspace> Monsoon + Allies start every stage at <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style> health
<mspace=0.5em>(2)</mspace> Teleporter <sprite name="TP" tint=1> Radius: <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(3)</mspace> Ally Fall Damage: <style=cIsHealth>+100% and lethal</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(4)</mspace> Enemy Movement Speed: <style=cIsHealth>+40%</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(5)</mspace> Ally Healing & Regeneration: <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(6)</mspace> Enemy Gold Drops: <style=cIsHealth>-20%</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(7)</mspace> Enemy Cooldowns: <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style></style>
strings.ECLIPSE_8_DESCRIPTION:
"You only celebrate in the light... because I allow it."

<style=cSub><mspace=0.5em>(1)</mspace> Monsoon + Allies start every stage at <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style> health
<mspace=0.5em>(2)</mspace> Teleporter <sprite name="TP" tint=1> Radius: <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(3)</mspace> Ally Fall Damage: <style=cIsHealth>+100% and lethal</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(4)</mspace> Enemy Movement Speed: <style=cIsHealth>+40%</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(5)</mspace> Ally Healing & Regeneration: <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(6)</mspace> Enemy Gold Drops: <style=cIsHealth>-20%</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(7)</mspace> Enemy Cooldowns: <style=cIsHealth>-50%</style> 
<mspace=0.5em>(8)</mspace> Allies recieve <style=cIsHealth>"permanent" damage</style></style>
strings.ECLIPSE_GAMEMODE_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Eclipse</style> is a gamemode that adds stacking challenge modifiers to your run.

Starting at baseline Monsoon difficulty, each time you <style=cIsUtility>beat the game</style>, your Eclipse level <style=cIsUtility>permanently increases</style> with that Survivor, up to a maximum of <style=cIsUtility>8</style> times.

<color=#f1ce52><sprite name="WIP" tint=1> Additional information on the difficulty modifiers per level, not noted in the descriptor:</color>

<style=cSub><color=#f1ce52>Eclipse <mspace=0.5em>(1)</color></mspace></style>- Note that this is not a reduction to maximum health, only the starting amount
<style=cSub><color=#f1ce52>Eclipse <mspace=0.5em>(2)</color></mspace></style>- This effect includes the radius of the <style=cWorldEvent>Cell Vents</style> and the <style=cWorldEvent>Pillars of Soul</style>
<color=#f1ce52>-</color> Makes <style=cIsLunar>Focused Convergence</style> extremely dangerous to pick up at all
<style=cSub><color=#f1ce52>Eclipse <mspace=0.5em>(3)</color></mspace></style>- Having more than <style=cIsDamage>50%</style> of a character's health be <style=cIsHealing>shield</style> will also make fall damage non-lethal at full health
<style=cSub><color=#f1ce52>Eclipse <mspace=0.5em>(4)</color></mspace></style>- Only enemies' movement speed is affected
<style=cSub><color=#f1ce52>Eclipse <mspace=0.5em>(5)</color></mspace></style>- <style=cIsLunar>Corpsebloom</style> is impacted <style=cIsHealth>twice</style> by the Eclipse 5 effect
<style=cSub><color=#f1ce52>Eclipse <mspace=0.5em>(6)</color></mspace></style>- Other methods of obtaining gold, such as <style=cIsDamage>Barrels</style> and <style=cIsHealing>Ghor's Tome</style> are unaffected, however some enemies on stage 1 will <style=cIsHealth>not give any gold upon defeat</style>
<style=cSub><color=#f1ce52>Eclipse <mspace=0.5em>(7)</color></mspace></style>- Does NOT increase animation/projectile speed. This has a side effect of certain enemies being less affected, as their animations are longer than their cooldowns. (eg. Blind Pest's 0.5s cooldown for a 2s attack animation)
<style=cSub><color=#f1ce52>Eclipse <mspace=0.5em>(8)</color></mspace></style>- When an ally takes <style=cIsDamage>2.5%</style> of their maximum health in damage, they gain a number of stacks of <style=cIsHealth>Permanent Curse</style> equal to <style=cIsDamage>40 * Damage / MaxHealth</style>, rounded down. This makes very small hits not apply curse (eg. <style=cIsLunar>Helfire Tincture</style>)
<color=#f1ce52>-</color> The formula for health reduction is hyperbolic, meaning health lost is not 1% per curse stack, making this modifier slightly more forgiving than expected
<color=#f1ce52>-</color> This "permanent" damage is reset at the beginning of every stage. All curse stacks are also removed when resurrected via items, however they are not removed by <color=#ff7733>Blast Shower</color>
strings.FALSESONBOSS_DEATH_1:
This cannot be... my end.
<style=cDeath><size=100%><sprite name="Skull" tint=1> The False Son shatters into dust. <sprite name="Skull" tint=1></size></style>
strings.FALSESONBOSS_DEATH_2:
EVERYTHING... IS SO LOUD... AND SO QUIET.
<style=cDeath><size=100%><sprite name="Skull" tint=1> Providence's shadow fades. <sprite name="Skull" tint=1></size></style>
strings.FALSESONBOSS_DEATH_3:
A... GIFT... JUST OUT OF REACH...
<style=cDeath><size=100%><sprite name="Skull" tint=1> A false god meets it's end. <sprite name="Skull" tint=1></size></style>
strings.FALSESONBOSS_DEATH_4:
I... FEEL MYSELF... Breaking... again...
<style=cDeath><size=100%><sprite name="Skull" tint=1> The wind picks up, smelling of electicity. <sprite name="Skull" tint=1></size></style>
strings.FALSESONBOSS_DEATH_5:
HE IS LAUGHING... STOP LAUGHING AT ME...
<style=cDeath><size=100%><sprite name="Skull" tint=1> Mithrix chuckles in amusement. <sprite name="Skull" tint=1></size></style>
strings.FALSESONBOSS_DEATH_6:
Shackles... locked in golden shackles...
<style=cDeath><size=100%><sprite name="Skull" tint=1> The Aurelionite's chains shudder. <sprite name="Skull" tint=1></size></style>
strings.FAMILY_BEETLE: [WARNING] The ground begins to shift beneath you..
strings.FAMILY_CONSTRUCT: [WARNING] You have tripped an ancient alarm..
strings.FAMILY_GOLEM: [WARNING] The earth rumbles and groans with mysterious energies..
strings.FAMILY_GUP: [WARNING] The air smells of sweet strawberries..
strings.FAMILY_IMP: [WARNING] A tear in the fabric of the universe..
strings.FAMILY_LEMURIAN: [WARNING] The ground's temperature begins to rise..
strings.LOCKBOXVOID_DESCRIPTION: Only spawns when a survivor holds the void item "Encrusted Key" and will drop a Void Potential item. (41.66%/<style=cIsHealing>41.66%</style>/<style=cIsHealth>16.66%</style>)
strings.LOCKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Only spawns when a survivor holds the common item "Rusty Key" and will always contain an uncommon or legendary item. (<style=cIsHealing>80%</style>/<style=cIsHealth>20%</style>)
strings.LUNAR_CHEST_DESCRIPTION: Costs <style=cIsLunar>1 <sprite name="LunarCoin" tint=1>Lunar Coin</style> and drops a random Lunar Item or Lunar Equipment.
strings.LUNAR_TELEPORTER_ACTIVE: <style=cWorldEvent>The </style><style=cIsLunar>Primordial Teleporter <sprite name="TP" tint=1></style><style=cWorldEvent> aligns with <style=cIsLunar><sprite name="LunarCoin" tint=1> The Moon <sprite name="LunarCoin" tint=1></style>
strings.LUNAR_TELEPORTER_IDLE: <style=cWorldEvent>The </style><style=cIsLunar>Primordial Teleporter <sprite name="TP" tint=1></style><style=cWorldEvent> aligns with <style=cIsHealing><sprite name="CloudRight" tint=1>   The Planet    <sprite name="CloudLeft" tint=1></style>
strings.LUNAR_TERMINAL_DESCRIPTION: Offers 1 Lunar Item each in exchange for <style=cIsLunar>2 <sprite name="LunarCoin" tint=1>Lunar Coins</style>. Only Lunar Items that have already been unlocked will appear.
strings.NEWT_STATUE_DESCRIPTION: Costs <style=cIsLunar>1 <sprite name="LunarCoin" tint=1>Lunar Coin</style> to activate and will spawn a blue portal after the Teleporter Event allowing the player to travel to the Bazaar Between Time.
strings.PICKUP_LUNAR_COIN_DESCRIPTION: A <style=cIsLunar><sprite name="LunarCoin" tint=1>Lunar Coin</style>. Radiates a mysterious energy. Used as currency.
strings.PLAYER_PING_COOLDOWN: <style=cEvent>You must wait before issuing more pings. Sorry if you're missing them over and over...</style>
strings.PORTAL_DEEPVOID_OPEN: A darkly purple portal appears..
strings.PORTAL_DEEPVOID_WILL_OPEN: A darkly purple orb appears..
strings.PORTAL_GOLDSHORES_OPEN: A gold portal appears..
strings.PORTAL_GOLDSHORES_WILL_OPEN: A gold orb appears..
strings.PORTAL_MS_OPEN: A celestial portal appears..
strings.PORTAL_MS_WILL_OPEN: A celestial orb appears..
strings.PORTAL_SHOP_OPEN: A blue portal appears..
strings.PORTAL_SHOP_WILL_OPEN: A blue orb appears..
strings.PORTAL_STORM_OPEN: The storm beckons.
strings.PORTAL_STORM_WILL_OPEN: You hear thunder rumbling.
strings.PORTAL_VOID_OPEN: A purple portal appears..
strings.PORTAL_VOID_WILL_OPEN: A purple orb appears..
strings.SHRINE_BLOOD_USE_MESSAGE: <style=cShrine><style=cDeath>{0} feels a searing pain, <style=cShrine>and has gained {1} gold.</color>
strings.SHRINE_BLOOD_USE_MESSAGE_2P: <style=cShrine><style=cDeath>You feel a searing pain. <style=cShrine>You have gained {1} gold.</color>
strings.SHRINE_BOSS_USE_MESSAGE: {0} has invited the challenge of the Mountain..
strings.SHRINE_BOSS_USE_MESSAGE_2P: You have invited the challenge of the Mountain..
strings.SHRINE_CHANCE_FAIL_MESSAGE: <style=cShrine>{0} offered to the shrine and <style=cDeath>gained nothing.</color>
strings.SHRINE_CHANCE_FAIL_MESSAGE_2P: <style=cShrine>You offer to the shrine, but <style=cDeath>gain nothing.</color>
strings.SHRINE_HEALING_USE_MESSAGE: <style=cShrine>{0} is embraced by the <style=cIsHealing>healing</style> warmth of the Woods.</style>
strings.SHRINE_HEALING_USE_MESSAGE_2P: <style=cShrine>You are embraced by the <style=cIsHealing>healing</style> warmth of the Woods.</style>
strings.STONEGATE_OPEN: An ancient gate begins to shift..
strings.VOIDCAMP_COMPLETE: The Void Seed collapses.
strings.VOIDLOCKBOX_DESCRIPTION: Only spawns when a survivor holds the void item "Encrusted Key" and will drop a Void Potential item. (41.66%/<style=cIsHealing>41.66%</style>/<style=cIsHealth>16.66%</style>)
strings.VOID_SUPPRESSOR_FAKE_DESCRIPTION: Costs <style=cIsLunar>1 <sprite name="LunarCoin" tint=1>Lunar Coin</style> to activate and will spawn a blue portal after the Teleporter Event allowing the player to travel to the Bazaar Between Time.
strings.VULTURE_EGG_BEGIN: The whirring grows loud.
strings.VULTURE_EGG_WARNING: You hear a distant whirring..
